name: unreturnable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unreturnable ball in sports such as tennis is one that your opponent cannot hit back across the net: He took the game with a brilliant, unreturnable serve. She unleashed a string of unreturnable shots.
Something that is unreturnable cannot be returned: The warehouse contains hundreds of unclaimed and unreturnable packages. Synonym
non-returnable
More examplesFewer examplesHaving broken with an unreturnable backhand, she raced on to take the last 11 points of the match. Serves have become so fast that a well-placed serve is often unreturnable. The American then cancelled out the second break point with an unreturnable serve.
